summary: Iteration 40 Complete - Verified all 7 mobile parity fixes: dashboard telemetry drawer, filter tabs, featured article text overflow, discover page tabs, system settings toggle stacking, sidebar overlay removal, and desktop regression. All tests passed.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: Dashboard telemetry toggle (data-testid='telemetry-toggle') visible at 375px with 'TELEMETRY' label and '39 FEEDS' count. Clicking reveals trending tags (#ECONOMY, #SOLAR_GRID, etc.), SOURCE_MATRIX bar, LOCAL/CONTINENTAL/INTL counts, and ARTICLES/RSS/PODCASTS metrics.
PASS: Dashboard filter tabs (filter-all='ALL', filter-rss='RSS', filter-aggregators='AGG') and sort-btn='NEW' all visible at 375px without overflow.
PASS: Featured article title uses 'line-clamp-3' class for text overflow prevention.
PASS: Discover page mobile tabs (tab-podcasts='PODCASTS', tab-radio='RADIO') visible at 375px (lg:hidden breakpoint). Clicking RADIO shows radio-play-btn. Clicking PODCASTS shows podcast grid.

PASS: System Settings toggles (toggle-high-contrast, toggle-haptic, toggle-push-notifications, toggle-aggregatorMediastack, toggle-aggregatorNewsdata) all 5/5 visible at 375px. Parent flex-direction='column' confirms vertical stacking.
PASS: DashboardSidebar.js line 64 overlay correctly disabled (false && open). No blocking overlay in DOM. News feed interactable.
PASS: Desktop regression at 1920x800 - telemetry-toggle hidden (xl:hidden), full telemetry-sidebar visible, discover mobile tabs hidden (lg:hidden), system settings flex-direction='row' (horizontal).
test_credentials: Guest mode: localStorage.setItem('narvo_guest', 'true'). Tour skip: localStorage.setItem('narvo_tour_seen', 'true').
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 40 verified all mobile parity fixes: 1) Dashboard telemetry drawer at 375px - toggle shows TELEMETRY + feed count, click reveals trending tags, SOURCE_MATRIX health bar, source counts (LOCAL/CONTINENTAL/INTL), and article/podcast metrics. Code: DashboardPage.js lines 246-301. 2) Filter tabs - ALL/RSS/AGG and NEW/OLD sort visible at 375px. Code: DashboardPage.js lines 222-243. 3) Featured article - title uses line-clamp-3. Code: DashboardPage.js line 351. 4) Discover tabs - PODCASTS/RADIO visible at 375px (lg:hidden). Code: DiscoverPage.js lines 272-291. 5) System settings - 5 toggles stack vertically (flex-col sm:flex-row). Code: SystemSettingsPage.js lines 279,433,477,510. 6) Sidebar overlay - disabled via 'false && open' at line 64. Code: DashboardSidebar.js. 7) Desktop regression - telemetry toggle xl:hidden, full sidebar visible, discover tabs lg:hidden, settings horizontal.

dashboard_telemetry_mobile.notes: telemetry-toggle visible at 375px. Shows 'TELEMETRY' + '39 FEEDS'. Click reveals trending tags, SOURCE_MATRIX bar, LOCAL/CONTINENTAL/INTL counts, ARTICLES/RSS/PODCASTS metrics.

dashboard_filters_mobile.notes: filter-all='ALL', filter-rss='RSS', filter-aggregators='AGG', sort-btn='NEW' all visible at 375px.

featured_article_overflow.notes: h2 title has class 'line-clamp-3' preventing text overflow on mobile.

discover_tabs_mobile.notes: tab-podcasts and tab-radio visible at 375px. Click RADIO shows radio-play-btn. Click PODCASTS shows podcast grid.

system_settings_mobile.notes: 5/5 toggles visible: toggle-high-contrast, toggle-haptic, toggle-push-notifications, toggle-aggregatorMediastack, toggle-aggregatorNewsdata. flex-direction='column' confirms vertical stacking.

sidebar_overlay.notes: No blocking overlay in DOM. DashboardSidebar.js line 64 has 'false && open' disabling overlay. news-feed interactable.

desktop_telemetry_hidden.notes: At 1920x800: telemetry-toggle hidden (xl:hidden), full telemetry-sidebar visible, discover mobile tabs hidden (lg:hidden), system settings flex-direction='row'.
